Welcome to the Python Outbreak.info API’s documentation!¶

Here you can find information on the functions you will use to collect and analyze SARS-COV-2 data from the Outbreak.info API. Our package pulls data from the Outbreak.info API and is reflected on our Outbreak.info web interface

Note

This project is under active development.

Contents¶

  • get_outbreak_data()
  • cases_by_location(location)
  • lineage_mutations(pango_lin, mutation, freq)
  • prevalence_by_location(location, startswith)
  • global_prevalence(pango_lin, mutations, cumulative)
  • sequence_counts(location, cumulative, sub_admin)
  • mutations_by_lineage(mutation, location, pango_lin)
